insert into "products" ("body_html", "created_at", "handle", "id", "image", "images", "options", "product_type", "published_at", "published_scope", "tags", "template_suffix", "title", "metafields_global_title_tag", "metafields_global_description_tag", "updated_at", "variants", "vendor") values ('
  • 23.8 HP 24w 1080p Widescreen LED IPS LCD Monitor
  • General Features:
  • Color: Black
  • Micro-edge display
  • Low Blue Light
  • Display size (diagonal): 23.8
  • Panel active area: 52.7 x 29.6 cm
  • Display type: IPS w/LED backlight
  • Aspect ratio: 16:9
  • Native resolution: FHD (1920 x 1080 @ 60 Hz)
  • Pixel pitch: 0.2745 mm (H) x 0.2745 mm (W)
  • Color Gamut: NTSC 72%
  • Display color: Up to 16.7 million colors supported (through FRC technology)
  • Brightness: 250 cd/m2
  • Contrast ratio: 1000:1 static, 5M:1 dynamic
  • Response time: 5 ms gray to gray
  • Horizontal viewing angle (typical): 178 degrees
  • Vertical viewing angle (typical): 178 degrees
  • Tilt and swivel angle Tilt: -5 to +23°
  • Horizontal scan frequency: 30-80 kHz
  • Vertical scan frequency: 50-60 Hz
  • Wall mountable: 100mm x 100mm
  • Security lock-ready
  • Display Features:
  • Anti-glare
  • In plane switching
  • Language selection
  • LED Backlights
  • On-screen controls
  • Plug and Play
  • User programmable
  • Anti-static
  • Ports:
  • One (1) HDMI w/HDCP support
  • One (1) VGA
  • Power Specifications:
  • 100- 240V ~ 0.75-0.3A, 50/60Hz
  • Unit Dimensions:
  • With stand: 15.8 x 21.3 x 7.3-inches (H x W x D, approximate)
  • Without stand: 12.75 x 21.3 x 1.9-inches (H x W x D, approximate)
  • Regulatory Approvals:
  • FCC
  • CE
  • TUV
  • CCC
  • RCM
  • VCCI
  • BSMI
  • WEEE
    • 23.8 HP 24w 1080p Widescreen LED IPS LCD Monitor
    • Software & Documentation CD
    • VGA cable
    • Power cord
    • Stand

    Condition : This item is Class A refurbished. This is the cleanest class of refurbished product you can buy. This item will be free of defects. It has been repaired and tested by the manufacturer and the problem parts were replaced.
